name: Goblin
description: Goblins are funny little guys. They love money and stealing things from other people.  hello world
description_2: Goblins should not be trusted by any degree by anyone.

name: Slime Cube
description: They may look like delicious jelly, but don't eat them. Otherwise you may lose your entire mouth due to their acidic touch.
description_2: These creatures are unable to be reasoned with as they lack a consciousness. They only live for consuming what they find around. This does make them good waste disposals however.
